member.name: T:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolder
member.summary: Provides a wrapper for creating and managing temporary folders. Concrete classes should implement IDisposable (not required) to remove temporary files and folders when the instance is no longer in use.

member.name: P:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolder.NamingFormat
member.summary: Gets/sets a string format with two variables, {0} and {1}, where the first place holder will be replaced with the temporary folder path and the second place holder will be replaced with the temporary folder name.

member.name: P:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolder.FullPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the temporary folder that is created by this instance.

member.name: T:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolderFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating instances of ITemporaryFolder.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolderFactory.Create
member.summary: Creates a default instance of ITemporaryFolder.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.ITemporaryFolderFactory.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a default instance of ITemporaryFolder using the given name format.
member.param: Specifies the naming format to use with this new instance

member.name: T:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolder
member.summary: Provides a wrapper for creating and managing temporary folders. Disposing this object will cleanup all temporary files and the folder that were created from this instance (as long as no files are locked when the object is disposed).

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolder.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Internally creates an instance of ITemporaryFolder using the given name format.
member.param: Specifies the naming format to use with this new instance

member.name: P:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolder.FullPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the temporary folder that is created by this instance.

member.name: P:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolder.NamingFormat
member.summary: Gets/sets a string format with two variables, {0} and {1}, where the first place holder will be replaced with the temporary folder path and the second place holder will be replaced with the temporary folder name. The default is "{0}{1}".

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolderFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents instances of this class from being created externally.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolderFactory.Create
member.summary: Creates a default instance of ITemporaryFolder.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.System.TemporaryFolder.TemporaryFolderFactory.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of ITemporaryFolder using the given name format.
member.param: Specifies the naming format to use with this new instance
